question: Food aggregator company Swiggy has partnered with which bank to launch its own digital wallet?
explanation:
Food aggregator platform and unicorn start-up Swiggy has launched its own digital wallet Swiggy Money in partnership with ICICI Bank.
The full-fledged digital wallet enables single-click checkout experience and will let its customers to store money and pay for all food orders on Swiggy. Swiggy has used ICICI Bankâ€™s insta wallet service API, to create its own wallet.
